No. 251012)} Sub: Establishment of Detailed Project Report (DPR) Cell at NHAI HQ Amendments in Policy Circular No. 1.7.1.22/2024 dated 24.05.2024 reg: The Policy Circular No. 1.7.1.22/2024 dated 24.05.2024 has been issued regarding "Establishment of Detailed Project Report (DPR) Cell at NHAI HQ' Further , deliberations and discussions have been made regarding the Eligibility Criteria and Remuneration Structure and some Amendments / Modifications have   been   approved by the Competent   Authority for incorporating in above   Policy Circular. Accordingly, the content of the Circular after incorporating the Amendments/ Modifications are as below Background: The need of good DPR for_Highway Projects is of paramount importance for Safety, Reliability and Quality Highways. This aspect has been examined & it is observed that ROs /PDs are generally unable to devote adequate time for review and qualitative inputs on DPR submissions/ deliverables. Also, non-uniformity in Review Mechanism of DPR Preparation is also one of the challenge: Therefore, in Order to uniformity in Review Mechanism, it has been decided to set- up DPR Cell at NHAI HQ for end-to-end monitoring and review of DPR Projects ensuring Quality DPRs are prepared and adequately challenged before Projects move to Implementation Stage. 2.1 Responsibilities of DPR Cell: Advise ROs / PDs in overall Planning and Methodology for  desired outcome of DPR Preparation: Advice and Support in finalization of Alignment from Techno Economic considerations_ Render necessary advice in finalization of design of various parameters of all Highway Components (Highway & Structures) as per extant IRC Specifications and Standards. Contribute to value engineering/innovative practices for enhancing Quality output in DPR relevant to the Projects. Conduct necessary Site Visits to overlook the Progress of DPR Projects. Review   adequacy of   testing on ground as per   frequency and adopted   Testing Methodology: Thoroughly review draft DPR Report, Final DPR Report, Documents and Drawings. Review of Cost Estimate based on Design Features, Quantification thereof and Rate Analysis: Review of Cost of Preconstruction Activities.
